\doxysection{Sensor\+Model Class Reference}
\hypertarget{class_sensor_model}{}\label{class_sensor_model}\index{SensorModel@{SensorModel}}


Defiens a \doxylink{class_sensor_model}{Sensor\+Model} to be used in the \doxylink{class_particle_filter}{Particle\+Filter}. This is used in the update step to revise the filter\textquotesingle{}s belief.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$sensor\+Model.\+h$>$}

virtual std\+::optional$<$ double $>$ \mbox{\hyperlink{class_sensor_model_a39aea7b966a95a3579714f84b408f6a1}{p}} (const Eigen\+::\+Vector3f \&x)=0
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Determine p(z\+\_\+k, x\+\_\+k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z\+\_\+k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x\+\_\+k). \end{DoxyCompactList}\item 
virtual void \mbox{\hyperlink{class_sensor_model_a28672cf65d6e6a9bc967e5661d26e21e}{update}} ()=0
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (\texorpdfstring{$\sim$}{\string~}10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Defiens a \doxylink{class_sensor_model}{Sensor\+Model} to be used in the \doxylink{class_particle_filter}{Particle\+Filter}. This is used in the update step to revise the filter\textquotesingle{}s belief.

\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{p()}{p()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily virtual std\+::optional$<$ double $>$ Sensor\+Model\+::p (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const Eigen\+::\+Vector3f \&}]{x }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [pure virtual]}}



Determine p(z\+\_\+k, x\+\_\+k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z\+\_\+k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x\+\_\+k).

\index{update@{update}!SensorModel@{SensorModel}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{update()}{update()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily virtual void Sensor\+Model\+::update (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [pure virtual]}}



Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (\texorpdfstring{$\sim$}{\string~}10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame. 



Implemented in \mbox{\hyperlink{class_distance_sensor_model_a1b691034552e9472807073bcface92f5}{Distance\+Sensor\+Model}}, \mbox{\hyperlink{class_gps_sensor_model_abd0fa91ecf89e4ca36aab41c2c60126e}{Gps\+Sensor\+Model}}, and \mbox{\hyperlink{class_line_sensor_model_a055567b171c5405d2af8f3ac729e058a}{Line\+Sensor\+Model}}.
